Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 436 Licensing; Accidents

436.01Driver’s license or commercial driver’s license required.

436.02Permitting operation without valid license; one license permitted.

436.03Driving with temporary instruction permit; curfew.

436.031Driving with probationary license; curfew.

436.032Use of electronic wireless communication device prohibited while driving.

436.04Certain acts prohibited.

436.05Wrongful entrustment of a motor vehicle.

436.06Display of license.

436.07Driving under suspension or license restriction.

436.071Driving under OVI suspension.

436.072Driving under financial responsibility law suspension or cancellation; driving under a nonpayment of judgement suspension.

436.073Driving without complying with license reinstatement requirements.

436.074Driving under license forfeiture or child support suspension.

436.08Operation or sale without certificate of title.

436.09Display of license plates.

436.10Expired or unlawful license plates.

436.11Use of illegal license plates; transfer of registration.

436.12Stopping after accident upon streets; collision with unattended vehicle.

436.13Stopping after accident upon property other than street.

436.14Vehicle accident resulting in damage to realty.

436.15Defects or infirmities in drivers.

CROSS REFERENCES

See sectional histories for similar State law

Deposit of driver’s license as bond - see Ohio R.C. 2937.221

Motor vehicle licensing law - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 4503

Driver’s license law - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 4507

Power of trial court of record to suspend or revoke license for certain violations - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 4510

State point system suspension - see Ohio R.C. 4510.03.6

State accident reports - see Ohio R.C. 4509.01(J), 4509.06, 4509.74, 5502.11

Motorized bicycle operator’s license - see Ohio R.C. 4511.521

Glass removal from street after accident - see TRAF. 412.01
